txt.en: Upon entering Iserngraf, it is clear that the invaders will not leave peaceably. You take it upon yourself to discourage a number of them, thinning their presence in the mine.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Iserngraf: Severance to be underway in order to access Iserngraf. If that quest has been completed, or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter Iserngraf in order to complete this quest.</rgb>

Upon entering Iserngraf, it is clear that the invaders will not leave peaceably. You take it upon yourself to discourage a number of them, thinning their presence in the mine.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Iserngraf: Severance to be underway in order to access Iserngraf. If that quest has been completed, or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter Iserngraf in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
'Well done! Your efforts have discouraged our enemy and should allow us to even more easily displace them!'
Iserngraf is teeming with invading enemies. Reducing their numbers should make them less of a threat for the Rohirrim when they return to reclaim this mine.
Having reduced the ranks of enemies within Iserngraf, return to Frithnoth and apprise him of your efforts.
Have you killed all the monsters yet?
